mapper.select: select count(1) from channel_super_info where channel_super_code = #{code}
select
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM channel_user_info a LEFT JOIN channel_info b ON a.channel_id = b.id LEFT JOIN user_info c ON a.user_id = c.id
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM channel_user_info a LEFT JOIN channel_info b ON a.channel_id = b.id LEFT JOIN user_info c ON a.user_id = c.id left join channel_super_info s on s.id = b.channel_super_id

SELECT b.channel_code,b.channel_name,b.operator_name, b.channel_tel,b.created_at,b.updated_at,b.apr, c.realname AS realname,c.user_phone AS userPhone,a.rel_path as relPath,a.remark as remark,c.create_time AS createTime FROM channel_user_info a LEFT JOIN channel_info b ON a.channel_id = b.id LEFT JOIN user_info c ON a.user_id = c.id left join channel_super_info s on s.id = b.channel_super_id
order by created_at DESC

SELECT CONVERT( CONCAT( CONCAT( CONCAT( CONCAT( '
  • ' ), b.user_phone ), '
      • ' ) USING utf8) AS html FROM channel_user_info a LEFT JOIN user_info b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.channel_id IS NULL and b.user_phone like CONCAT('%', #{userPhone}, '%') ORDER BY a.user_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_info a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE id IN(SELECT user_id FROM channel_user_info) ) b ON a.invite_userid=b.id LEFT JOIN channel_info d ON d.id = a.user_from

SELECT b.realname as realname,b.user_phone AS userPhone,a.create_time AS createTime, a.realname AS userName,a.user_phone AS userTel,d.* FROM user_info a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE id IN(SELECT user_id FROM channel_user_info) ) b ON a.invite_userid=b.id LEFT JOIN channel_info d ON d.id = a.user_from
order by a.create_time DESC
select count(1) FROM channel_info a LEFT JOIN channel_super_info b ON a.channel_super_id = b.id

SELECT a.*,b.channel_super_name AS channelSuperName, channel_super_code as channelSuperCode,c.channel_rate_name AS channelRateName, a.qq_status as qqStatus, a.wechat_status as wechatStatus FROM channel_info a LEFT JOIN channel_super_info b ON a.channel_super_id = b.id LEFT JOIN channel_rate c on a.rate_id = c.id
order by a.created_at DESC

SELECT cd.apk_url as apkUrl, cd.channel_tag as channelTag, cd.download_pic_url as downloadPicUrl, cd.register_pic_url as registerPicUrl, cd.pic_code_num as picCodeNum, cd.toutiao_convert_id as toutiaoConvertId, cd.user_info_id as userInfoId, a.*, b.channel_super_name AS channelSuperName, channel_super_code AS channelSuperCode, c.channel_rate_name AS channelRateName FROM channel_info a LEFT JOIN channel_super_info b ON a.channel_super_id = b.id LEFT JOIN channel_rate c ON a.rate_id = c.id LEFT JOIN channel_dynamic cd on cd.channel_info_id = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC

select
where channel_code = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select (SELECT COUNT(1) from user_info u where u.user_from=#{channelId}) countUser, (select SUM(b.money_amount) FROM asset_borrow_order b LEFT JOIN user_info u on b.user_id=u.id WHERE u.user_from=#{channelId})totalMonery from DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO channel_info (channel_name, channel_code, channel_super_id, operator_name, channel_tel, channel_province, channel_city, channel_area, created_at, updated_at, rate_id, remark, channel_password, status, channel_url, promotion_url, qq_status, wechat_status) VALUES ( #{channelName}, #{channelCode}, #{channelSuperId}, #{operatorName}, #{channelTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelProvince}, #{channelCity}, #{channelArea}, NOW(), #{updatedAt}, #{rateId}, #{remark}, #{channelPassword}, #{status}, #{channelUrl}, #{promotionUrl}, #{qqStatus}, #{wechatStatus});
mapper.update: UPDATE channel_info SET channel_super_id = #{channelSuperId}, channel_name = #{channelName}, channel_code = #{channelCode}, operator_name = #{operatorName}, channel_tel = #{channelTel}, channel_province = #{channelProvince}, channel_city = #{channelCity}, channel_area = #{channelArea}, created_at = #{createdAt}, channel_password = #{channelPassword}, updated_at = NOW(), rate_id = #{rateId}, remark = #{remark}, status = #{status}, channel_url = #{channelUrl}, promotion_url = #{promotionUrl}, qq_status = #{qqStatus}, wechat_status = #{wechatStatus} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.channel_super_name AS channelSuperName,channel_super_code as channelSuperCode,c.channel_rate_name AS channelRateName FROM channel_info a LEFT JOIN channel_super_info b ON a.channel_super_id = b.id LEFT JOIN channel_rate c on a.rate_id = c.id
order by a.created_at DESC
select count(1) FROM channel_info a

SELECT b.channel_code,b.channel_name,b.operator_name, b.channel_tel,b.created_at,b.updated_at,b.apr, c.realname AS realname,c.user_phone AS userPhone,a.rel_path as relPath,a.remark as remark,c.create_time AS createTime, d.channel_tag AS channelTag, d.register_pic_url AS registerPicUrl, d.download_pic_url AS downloadPicUrl FROM channel_user_info a LEFT JOIN channel_info b ON a.channel_id = b.id LEFT JOIN user_info c ON a.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN channel_dynamic d ON d.channel_info_id=b.id and a.user_id = d.user_info_id
order by created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM channel_user_info a LEFT JOIN channel_info b ON a.channel_id = b.id LEFT JOIN user_info c ON a.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN channel_dynamic d ON d.channel_info_id=a.channel_id
SELECT ch.channel_name, ch.id FROM user_info u, channel_info ch WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND ch.id = u.user_from
select id,channel_name from channel_info

select count(id) as loanCount from asset_repayment where status in('21','23','30') and DATE_FORMAT(credit_repayment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_FORMAT(#{loanTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and user_id in
#{userId}

select count(id) as repayCount from asset_repayment where status in ('23','30','34') and DATE_FORMAT(repayment_real_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and user_id in
#{userId}

SELECT count(1) as borrowCountToday FROM asset_borrow_order t WHERE DATE_FORMAT( order_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{applyTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) and user_id in
#{userId}
select id from user_info where user_from=#{channeId}
SELECT COUNT(id) from user_info where qq_wechat=1 and user_from=#{channelId}
SELECT COUNT(id) from user_info where qq_wechat=2 and user_from=#{channelId}
